findings.title: EIP20 API Approve / TransferFrom multiple withdrawal attack
findings.description: A known vulnerability where an attacker can drain a user's funds by repeatedly calling approve and transferFrom functions.

findings.title: Non-standard usage of 'decimals' in PolyDistribution
findings.description: The constant 'decimals' has a non-standard definition in PolyDistribution, which may cause confusion for reviewers as it differs from the ERC20 standard.
